pr_title: [FLINK-16608][python] Support primitive data types for vectorized Python UDF

timeline.bodyText: Should we also adjust the precision and scale here, like it in DecimalWriter? If we pass a decimal with different precision and scale, an exception will be thrown.
timeline.author: hequn8128

timeline.bodyText: Should we also adjust the precision and scale here, like it in DecimalWriter? If we pass a decimal with different precision and scale for the BaseRowDecimalWriter, an exception will be thrown.
timeline.author: hequn8128

timeline.bodyText: DateWriter is used for the old planner. It seems we can't use the blink planner class directly here, otherwise, Pyflink will depend on blink planner even it is configured to use the old planner.
timeline.author: hequn8128
